name: Reel Deal Slots: Mysteries of Cleopatra
name_original: Reel Deal Slots: Mysteries of Cleopatra
description:
Reel Deal Slots: Mysteries of Cleopatra is a game developed by Phantom EFX. It came out on 29-08-2010. Phantom EFX published the game.
You can play Reel Deal Slots: Mysteries of Cleopatra on PC.
